palette[] = {				// R5  G6  B5
	0b0011000110000110,		//  6, 12,  6
	0b0110001100101100,		// 12, 25, 12
	0b1001010010010010,		// 18, 36, 18
	0b1111011110011011,		// 30, 60, 27
	0b1000000011100100,		// 16,  7,  4
	0b1100000111000111,		// 24, 14,  7
	0b1100110010100010,		// 25, 37,  2
	0b1110111000001111,		// 29, 48, 15
	0b0100001010100111,		//  8, 21,  7
	0b0111010011101100,		// 14, 39, 12
	0b1110111010000101,		// 29, 52,  5
	0b1110110010000111,		// 29, 36,  7
	0b0100000110001111,		//  8, 12, 15
	0b0011101011111000,		//  7, 23, 24
	0b0101011010011001,		// 10, 52, 25
	0b0111101010100100,		// 15, 21,  4
};
